name: Keep of the Witch v0.1D
description:
Version 0.1Demo

Work Time: 5 months

An Adventure game where you ascend a castle with puzzling and platforming, leading to Boss fights at the end of each floor. Eventually you are to reach the top floor to save the princess, whenever the game's development gets there.

v 0.1 D

  • Four main playable Characters
  • Complete first floor
  • The First boss: Dullahan

Previous version: https://regalfang.itch.io/side-castle-project-v002

From the Side Castle Project to the Keep of the Witch, I've completed it's base and now I'll need to work upwards in terms of completed assets. Version 0.2 will have the completed 2nd floor, Harpy boss, and maybe the Maid/Shopkeeper.

oh yah, I haven't made any sound tracks or sound effects yet so, the game's still somewhat silent.

If you want to see updates or design drafts, I post them here: https://www.patreon.com/theregalfang
